publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2540 Michael Matheson: Forth Valley College Boost—That the Parliament welcomes the news that the Scottish Funding Council has awarded Forth Valley College £30 million of funding to transform the facilities at the Forth Valley College sites in Falkirk, Stirling and Alloa; agrees with College Principal Linda McKay that "These truly are exciting and transformational times for Forth Valley learners"; acknowledges that this is a vote of confidence by the Scottish Funding Council in Forth Valley College, and wishes the staff and pupils well in the coming years in their new facilities.

S3M-2540 Forth Valley College Boost (lodged on 12 September 2008) Robin Harper*, John Wilson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bob Doris*, Alex Neil*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Keith Brown*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-2540 Forth Valley College Boost (lodged on 12 September 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-2540 Forth Valley College Boost (lodged on 12 September 2008) Christina McKelvie*
S3M-2540 Forth Valley College Boost (lodged on 12 September 2008) Gil Paterson*
